sources.name: AzureSqlTable1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  AzureSqlTable1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared AzureSqlTable1 = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("gecoproject.database.windows.net", "db_gecoproject", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "MedicalDatasetMerged"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = AzureSqlTable1,
  #"Capitalized each word" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"Gender", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}}),
  #"Capitalized each word 1" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Capitalized each word", {{"Emp_status", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}, {"Education", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}, {"Marital_Status", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}, {"Disease", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}})
in
  #"Capitalized each word 1";
